Commands.Meltdown (Chant): Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV ×1.5High turn rateSelf: 3 turns ATK Up I; 5 turns MAX BRV Up IIAfter Use - Target: 2 turns DEF Down ITriggers HP attack Meltdown+
Commands.Meltdown+: HP attack.Target: 2 turns DEF Down I.High turn rate
Commands.Meteor (Chant): Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV ×1.5High turn rateSelf: 3 turns ATK Up I; 5 turns SPD Up IAfter Use - Target: 2 turns SPD Down ITriggers Meteor+ (10-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack)
Commands.Meteor+: 10-hit Non-elemental BRV magic attack + HP attack.Target: 2 turns SPD Down I
Commands.Riot Blade: 3-hit magic BRV attack + HP attackMore powerful with greater difference between MAX and current HP

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Trance Boost: Increases the effects of Trance by 5%.
Artifacts.Bravery Meltdown+: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Meltdown+.
Artifacts.Mighty Meteor+: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Meteor+ by 10%.

Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits
Passives.Meltdown Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using 「Meltdown (Chant)」
Passives.Kill BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after killing an enemy
Passives.Meltdown BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using 「Meltdown (Chant)」
Passives.Meteor Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with 「Meteor+」
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Trance: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense if HP is Max when the final battle starts
Passives.Low BRV Initiative: Slightly raises SPD when BRV is below INT BRV
Passives.Meltdown (Chant) Extension: When using Meltdown (Chant): • Slight BRV increase based on ATK • Slight boost to MAX BRV UpWhen using Meltdown+: • 5 turns BRV Regen
Passives.Initial BRV Up: Moderately raises INT BRV while HP is at least 50% of MAX
Passives.Meteor (Chant) Extension: When using Meteor+:•BRV attacks increased to 15
